summary: Good application, work nearly out of box

description: Awesome open-src Burpsuite alternative, but a new user should reasonably expect that Hetty is less 'polished' for obvious reasons. Should also expect that Hetty requires more "book lernin' " to get the full capabilities out of it on a consistent basis. Still... it's a great thing, thanks to the dev(s) for making something of value.
summary: A few rough edges but a good open-src alternative to Burpsuite

description: Love to have a open-source alternative of burpsuite. I'm a beginner and I tend to use both. Thanks a lot for making this. Hopefully I can sponsor this soon!

summary: see the response body(i.e- not readable)
